title: Domestic Violence — Quick Checklist for Protection & Remedies
author: Adv. A. Sharma
excerpt: Step-by-step checklist for victims: preserve evidence, immediate reliefs, and drafting applications under the DV Act.
content:
### Quick checklist

1. Preserve evidence (photos, chats)
2. Draft application to Protection Officer and police complaint where needed
3. Seek interim reliefs (residence, maintenance)

### How we can help
If you need drafting or emergency reliefs, contact JusticeFirms: https://justicefirms.com/contact
